code:
import{TOGGLE_CART,ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,DECREASE_BY_ONE,INCREASE_BY_ONE,CLEAR_CART}from'./types';// @action - button onClick triggers action
export var toggleCart=function toggleCart(){return{type:TOGGLE_CART};};//@action   add item to cart
export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:item};};//@action   remove item from cart
export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_CART,payload:item};};//@action   decrease item by one
export var decreaseItemCount=function decreaseItemCount(item){return{type:DECREASE_BY_ONE,payload:item};};//@action   increase item by one
export var increaseItemCount=function increaseItemCount(item){return{type:INCREASE_BY_ONE,payload:item};};//@action   clear items in cart
export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CLEAR_CART};};
